story_stone_06_02000/2401_1101_0100_20:
After the mysterious, resonating voice interrupted
Professor Bellis’s presentation...
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_0300_10:
It seems nearly everyone in this arena heard the
same voice we did.
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_0900_10: Indeed! That was a message from Arceus!
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_1200_10:
I’m Volo—a humble merchant who loves history
and mythology!
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_1400_10:
When the arena shone brightly, I also heard that
voice!
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_1500_10:
There is powerful, mystical energy hidden within
the sync stones ultimate, isn’t there?
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_1600_10: So, could the sync stones ultimate be...
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_1700_10: a test given to us by Arceus?
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_1800_10:
If we’re able to show the “bond” that Arceus
desires here on Pasio, perhaps then—
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_1900_10:
Wait, where did you hear about the connection
between Arceus and the stones?
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_2000_10:
Investigating the odd and novel is key to any
good merchant’s success!
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_2200_10: Aren’t you curious about the deified Pokémon?
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_2300_10: Don’t you want to meet it?
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_2400_10:
H-hm... I would be lying if I said I wasn’t
interested...
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_2500_10: Perfect! Then, to show this deity your bond...
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_2600_10: you should hold a grand Pokémon tournament!
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_2700_10:
If Arceus were to make an appearance...why, the
audience would love to bear witness to a clash
between a king and a deity, don’t you agree?
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_2900_10:
A clash between a king and a deity... I like the
sound of that.
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_3000_10: Heh! Fine! Let’s not disappoint this deity, then!
story_stone_06_02000/2401_1201_3100_10:
Wow! You have a real gift for making quick
decisions! Impressive!
